Articles.Content: Hello, when I open the game i can see every button and can click on them but they do not have their normal names such as "load game" or "new game" but what i assume is their code names such as "#autoLOC_7001192", help would be greatly appreciated thank you. (I have no mods)

Welcome to the forum

Sounds like your localization dictionary is broken. If you got the game on steam, try to verify the data integrity (steam should recognize at least one missing file and download it again), otherwise go for a clean reinstall.
There is a small chance that steam will not notify you about any missing files and pretent as if anything is fine. In this case, go to 'KSP_install_directory/GameData/Squad/Localization'. The folder is supposed to contain a single file called 'dictionary.cfg'....delete it and verify the data integrity again.

I'm curious though: Do you play on linux, windows or mac? I know a few reports about localization issues but for myself, it only happend once when I tried to install the game on linux.
